short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A metro style inspired new tab with customizable tiles and windows like experience.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Yara's Newtab will replace your new tab with a new metro style customizable newtab.
Yara's Newtab is responsive and is aware of your window size to provide better user experience.
-you can add your websites as tiles, customize their colors, sizes, drag and sort them.
-you can change the background to your desire.
-you can change the avatar icon.
-you can add quick links on the side or top.

Change Log:
1.1.4
Added the ability to export saved links.
1.1.3
Added edit and remove tile to main tiles.
Removed old dragging method for removing Tiles.
Quick links are able to be removed with right click at the moment.
Fixed where the User Name and Nick Name wasn't changing.
